      set the spawn point for a team
      Parameters:
      l - a block where they must respawn
      teamColor - a team color owner of this spawn
      Throws:

    • setPowerupSpawn

      public void setPowerupSpawn​(org.bukkit.Location l, int seconds, int radius)
      set the powerup spawn location
      Parameters:
      l - the middle point of the spawn area
      seconds - delay between powerup spawn
      radius - the radius of the spawn area
      Throws:
      siege.exeptions.SiegeException - if an error occur

    • spawnRobot

      public com.siege.data.Robot spawnRobot​(org.bukkit.Location l, com.siege.data.constants.SiegeColor ownerTeam, int damage, int health)
      spawn a new robot
      Parameters:
      l - spawn location
      ownerTeam - owner of the robot
      damage - base damage
      health - robot health
      Returns:
      the spawned robot
      Throws:
      siege.exeptions.SiegeException - if an error occur
      IllegalStateException - if the caller is not the bukkit thread

    • spawnTower

      public com.siege.data.Tower spawnTower​(org.bukkit.Location l, com.siege.data.constants.SiegeColor color, int damage, int towerRadius, int health, double robotLevelMultiplier, int robotBaseDamage, int robotHealth)
      spawn a tower at the given location for a team based on the color with the specified damage per tick, reload speed, tower radius and health Note: negative values will be considerated as positive using v)
      Parameters:
      l - the tower position
      color - team color RED/BLUE only supported
      damage - damage per tick
      towerRadius - tower radius
      health - health of the tower.
      robotLevelMultiplier - base robot stats multiplier per level
      robotBaseDamage - robot base damage
      robotHealth - robot health
      Returns:
      the created tower
      Throws:
      siege.exeptions.SiegeException - if an error occur
      IllegalStateException - if the caller is not the bukkit thread

    • startGame

      public void startGame​(int maxPlayTime, int robotDelay)
      start a new game of siege if are set towers, player spawn areas, coins spawn area with the given max play time and robot spawn delay
      Parameters:
      maxPlayTime - max time playable in seconds
      robotDelay - robot spawn check delay in seconds
      Throws:
      siege.exeptions.SiegeException - if an error occur
      IllegalStateException - if the caller is not the bukkit thread

    • checkThread

      public static void checkThread()
      check if the caller of the method is the bukkit thread. If it's not the bukkit thread raise IllegalStateException
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the caller thread is not the bukkit thread
